result.arabic_text: وَوَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
result.translation: (85) And the decree will befall them[1088] for the wrong they did, and they will not [be able to] speak.
result.footnotes: [1088]- Allāh's decree will come into effect upon them, and His promise will be fulfilled.
